introduction: The land, going to war in Karabakh. It went to war to defend their homeland Armenian occupation of the best sons of our people are maimed, killed, are missing ...The transformation of an ordinary soldier is not known symbol of heroism is the film's main plot line. The film tells the story of the men of war that has crippled their fate. The film is the front line of events, taking place during the day in a military hospital. The authors dealt with the moral problems. As indicated by the name of the film, the authors wanted to say that the people who imminent disasters will force him to get rid of any kind of difficulties will be overcome.
